snippet.title: Playthings: VR Music Vacation, On Steam Now!
snippet.description:
Playthings was made to welcome anyone to the world of virtual reality. Built for the HTC Vive, Playthings puts virtual drumsticks in your hands and sets you loose on a musical playground from another world. There's no complicated buttons or tutorials--everyone knows how to use drumsticks. But drums are for real life. In Playthings, the instruments are made out of food: like hot dog xylophones and jelly bean harps.

Get it on Steam, August 24th! 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/489740/

http://playthingsvr.com
